name: OVERDRIVE (itch)
description:
VR shooter where time only moves when you do; until you enter OVERDRIVE!

"An opposing faction has invitated us to 'peaceful negotiations'.
It's obviously a trap.
Meet them at [██████████], and show them how we negotiate."

Take on your enemies with the ultimate ability - the power to bend time to your will; but will it be enough..?

Created in 5 days for the #MakeItSUPERHOT competition held by the SUPERHOT devs, ModDB, and others!

Requirements:

  • An HTC Vive
  • A VR-Ready PC (though the game is a little on the ligher side performance-wise)
  • Coordination

Gameplay instructions:
Point with your 'finger' at a UI button and pull the trigger to select.
Pick your preferred weapon, then select Missions, and pick your level.
Eliminate all the enemies.

Controls:
Trigger to Shoot
Grip to Reload
Touchpad + Trigger to Teleport
Touchpad + Grip to OVERDRIVE (when charged)

Menu to return to the main menu scene
